author: vors
body:
I pointed it to www.powershellgallery.com and not the myget at the moment.
I think it's reasonable at the moment.
If we decide to consume dev build of Archive module in the future, we can change the `SourceLocation` easily.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body:
Fixing helpuri failure https://github.com/PowerShell/Microsoft.PowerShell.Archive/pull/25

@vors you should compare the test code between the copy we have in PS/PS and what is in the Archive repo and merge them and get rid of it from this repo

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
The old failures seems to relate to the older (non-compatible with Core edition) version of Acrhive module in the gallery.
If they persist, we would need to initiate a new release for the archive before the switch.

comments.author: vors
SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @vors I'll have someone look into getting those issues fixed

comments.author: chunqingchen
comments.body: Can you please resolve the conflicts?

comments.author: mirichmo
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT @anmenaga - What is the current status of this? Is it still blocked?

comments.author: anmenaga
comments.body: The dependent work item (PowerShell/Microsoft.PowerShell.Archive#26) is almost done. I expect that it will be checked in next week.

title: Replace Archive module source code by download from the gallery
